tool.label: SCGEATOOLAPP
tool.summary: Single‑Cell Gene Expression Analysis Toolbox (scGEAToolbox) App
tool.description: SCGEATOOLAPP is a lightweight and blazing fast app that provides interactive visualization functionality to analyze single‑cell transcriptomic data. SCGEATOOLAPP allows you to easily interrogate different views of your scRNA‑seq data to quickly gain insights into the underlying biology.
